text:
Dear Alessandro and Jan,

Thank you for your comments and suggestions. I am sharing an ROI from the raw data, in false colour. The horizontal lines appear across the whole embryo.
I cleared the sample by iDISCO+, which worked very well: all my samples are completely transparent, except for the eye (black) and the liver (slightly yellow). I imaged in ethyl cinnamate, using dual side illumination (3 sheets from each side, sagittally), and no horizontal dynamic focus. 
I thought the lines looked much too regular to be shadowing, although I am not sure. I can see quite obvious shadowing around the eye (which has not cleared), for example.
As you can tell I am very much a LS novice, these are the first samples of my first UMII project!
